title: Jon Guzik (Borrow, Automobile, Hollywood Reporter)
description:
Jon Guzik has written about cars and everything else, for a long time. He talks to us about wearing a suit at a home office, crazy press launches, and his new company, Borrow, which arranges short-term leases of EVs at the click of a button. 

Watch the show! https://youtu.be/u7LBbfVqSbs

https://joinborrow.com/

https://jonalainguzik.com/

https://www.automobilemag.com/author/jon-alain-guzik/

https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/news/boschs-titus-welliver-takes-thr-ride-jeep-cherokee-1202360
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
